long_description: The pyramid-shaped Mombasa Nimbus mosquito net protects travelers with an easy 1-point suspension system. Easily fits standard bed sizes to protect 2 people during the night against nasty insects. Net is woven from strong polyester multi-filament fibers. Water-resistant stuff sack included. Small suspension kit is included. Please note: this net does not keep biting midges (no-see-ums) out.
short_description: The pyramid-shaped Mombasa Nimbus mosquito net protects travelers with an easy 1-point suspension system.
